llama3.1.reason: The claim is wrong because the context information explicitly states that "many of us probably don’t realise that some of our favourite films were actually based on classics from years (or even centuries) gone by" and provides examples, including Disney's The Lion King, which carries on Shakespeare themes. This suggests that films are being adapted or inspired by plays, not the other way around.
